translation: Vigor, forgiveness, fortitude, purity, absence of hatred, absence of pride—these belong to one born for a divine state, O Arjuna.
commentary: 16.3 brightness vigor? Forgiveness forgiveness? patience: fortitude? Shaucham purity? Adrohaḥ absence of hatred? Natimanita absence of overpride? Are they belong? Property state? Divine divine? of the noble to the one born for? India O descendant of Bharata (Arjuna).Commentary Tejas Vigor? energy? brilliance or luster of the skin. The aspirant who is bent on attaining salvation marches boldly on the spiritual path. Nothing
